title: Laptops
body: I'm looking for a cheap laptop to play lol on I'm pretty low on budget as I'm a collage student, price range maybe 100-400 if possible thanks :)

replies.body:
Hey mate 

In all honesty - just pocket the cash and keep saving. Get yourself a nice desktop PC (which you can build pretty good for even a little less then $1000) 

Try checking out local custom rig builders like 

[CPL Online](http://cplonline.com.au/)
[Centrecom 
](http://www.centrecom.com.au/)

Centrecom also have a handy tool for building a PC step by step that you should check out.

This. I have a nice laptop that was super useful for uni but the extra stuff I coughed up for now...starting to age, fast. Better had I just saved up.

Buy a cheap thing for your uni and a beast rig for gaming. You will actually save money over the years.
